commentBody:
You have to wonder how long a leash Ainge has at this stage.

Stevens appears to be an inspired hire. The roster can make some noise, albeit not at elite levels, and one presumes the "Gahdin" is sold out every home game.

That's the recipe for a successful NBA franchise. More fans should think of that as an end in itself.

The partners bought the franchise for $360 mil in '03. If the LA Clippers were worth $2 bil to Balmer, you can imagine what the Celtics valuation might be.

That's ownerships version of a championship!
